rukus.text: 55|1|Zhiren zhu,
55|2|ceng jiaoshou “gulanjing”,
55|3|ta chuangzaole ren,
55|4|bing jiao ren xiuci.
55|5|Ri yue shi yi dingshu er yunxing de.
55|6|Caomu shi shuncong ta de yizhi de.
55|7|Ta ceng jiang tian sheng qi. Ta ceng guiding gongping,
55|8|yimian nimen yong cheng bugong.
55|9|Nimen yingdang binggong di jin shou heng du, nimen buyao shi suo cheng zhi wu fenliang buzu.
55|10|Ta wei zhongsheng er jiang dadi fangxia.
55|11|Dadishang you shuiguo, he you hua bi di hai zao,
55|12|yu you gan de wugu he xiangcao.
55|13|Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
55|14|Ta ceng yong taoqi ban de gan tu chuangzao ren,
55|15|ta yong huoyan chuangzao jingling.
55|16|Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
55|17|Ta shi liang ge dongfang de zhu, yeshi liang ge xifang de zhu.
55|18|Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
55|19|Ta ceng ren liang hai xiangjiao er huihe,
55|20|liang hai zhi jian, you yige di fang, liang hai hu bu qinfan.
55|21|Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
55|22|Ta cong liang haizhong quchu zhenzhu he shanhu.
55|23|Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
55|24|Zai haizhong wei fan gaoju, zhuang ru shanluan de chuanbo, zhishi ta de.
55|25|Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
